definition: a disposition to kindness and compassion, make more attractive by adding ornament, colour, etc.
details:
noun
- a disposition to kindness and compassion
= example: a disposition to kindness and compassion
= synonyms: good will, goodwill
- (Christian theology) the free and unmerited favor or beneficence of God
= example: (Christian theology) the free and unmerited favor or beneficence of God
= synonyms: grace of God, free grace
- a sense of propriety and consideration for others
= example: a sense of propriety and consideration for others
= synonyms: seemliness
- elegance and beauty of movement or expression
= example: elegance and beauty of movement or expression
= synonyms: gracility
- a short prayer of thanks before a meal
= example: a short prayer of thanks before a meal
= synonyms: blessing
- (Christian theology) a state of sanctification by God
= synonyms: saving grace, state of grace
verb
- make more attractive by adding ornament, colour, etc.
= synonyms: ornament
- be beautiful to look at
= synonyms: deck
